mapper.select: SELECT TEA_ID, COU_NAME, COU_EXP, STARTDATE, STATE, COU_CNT FROM(SELECT TEA_ID, COU_NAME, COU_EXP, STARTDATE, STATE, COU_CNT FROM D_COURSE WHERE COU_NAME=#{cou_name} ORDER BY COU_CODE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO D_COURSE (COU_CODE, TEA_ID, COU_NAME, COU_EXP, STARTDATE, TOTALTIME, ENDDATE, COU_CNT,STATE)VALUES (SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{tea_id},#{cou_name},#{cou_exp},#{startdate},NULL,NULL,(SELECT NVL(MAX(COU_CNT),0)+1 FROM D_COURSE WHERE COU_NAME = #{cou_name}),`B`);
